text.section: The Board shall determine the times and places of its meetings.

Each member of the Board is entitled to:
Compensation in accordance with the State budget unless the member otherwise is a public official; and
Reimbursement for expenses under the Standard State Travel Regulations, as provided in the State budget.

section.section: With the approval of the Secretary, the Board may employ a Board secretary and other staff.
The Board secretary and other staff are entitled to compensation in accordance with the State budget.
